item.title: 独家报道授权公司称多家人工智能公司绕过网络标准搜索出版商网站
item.description: 内容授权初创公司 TollBit 已告知出版商，多家人工智能公司正在规避出版商使用的通用网络标准，以阻止其内容被用于生成式人工智能系统。【原文：Multiple artificial intelligence companies are circumventing a common web standard used by publishers to block the scraping of their content for use in generative AI systems, content licensing startup TollBit has told publishers.】

item.title: 美国股票基金连续两周出现资金外流
item.description: 在截至6月19日的七天里，美国投资者连续第二周抛售股票基金，因为他们在评估美联储的鹰派信号和欧洲持续的政治风险时持谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. investors shed equity funds for a second successive week in the seven days to June 19, exercising caution as they evaluated the Federal Reserve's hawkish signals and ongoing political risks in Europe.】

item.title: 美国 6 月商业活动稳步增长；价格压力减弱
item.description: 由于就业率回升，美国 6 月份的商业活动攀升至 26 个月以来的新高，但价格压力明显减弱，为近期通胀放缓可能持续带来了希望。【原文：U.S. business activity crept up to a 26-month high in June amid a rebound in employment, but price pressures subsided considerably, offering hope that a recent slowdown in inflation was likely to be sustained.】

item.title: 沃尔玛与 Capital One 就信用卡合作诉讼达成和解
item.description: 沃尔玛与 Capital One 就信用卡合作事宜达成和解，Capital One 成为沃尔玛品牌消费信用卡的独家发行商，但该合作关系在上个月终止。【原文：Walmart settled its lawsuit against Capital One over their credit card partnership, which had made Capital One the exclusive issuer of Walmart-branded consumer credit cards before ending last month.】

item.title: 美国运通将以 4 亿美元收购餐厅预订平台 Tock
item.description: 美国运通将以 4 亿美元的价格收购 Squarespace 旗下的餐厅预订平台 Tock，以扩大其在餐饮业的立足点，餐饮业是美国运通卡的最大消费类别之一。【原文：American Express is buying Squarespace-owned restaurant booking platform Tock for $400 million to expand its foothold in the dining industry, one of the biggest spending categories on its cards.】

item.title: 全球股票基金连续第二周出现资金外流
item.description: 在截至6月19日的一周里，全球股票基金连续第二周面临资金外流，投资者在美联储今年可能只降息一次的担忧和欧洲持续存在的政治风险下兑现了股票涨势。【原文：Global equity funds faced outflows for the second straight week in the week ending June 19, with investors cashing in on a share rally amid concerns that the Fed might cut rates only once this year and ongoing political risks in Europe.】

item.title: 消息人士称，凯雷正在推进意大利时装品牌 Twinset 的出售工作
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士周五透露，美国私募股权公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）正在推进出售意大利时装品牌 Twinset 的计划，并要求潜在竞购者提交不具约束力的报价。【原文：U.S. private equity firm Carlyle Group is pushing ahead with the sale of Italian fashion brand Twinset, asking potential bidders to submit non-binding offers, two sources close to the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫称美国禁用卡巴斯基软件的决定旨在扼杀竞争
item.description: 克里姆林宫周五表示，美国禁止销售卡巴斯基软件的决定是华盛顿扼杀外国与美国产品竞争的典型举措。【原文：The Kremlin said on Friday that a U.S. decision to ban sales of Kaspersky's software was a typical move by Washington to stifle foreign competition with American products.】

item.title: 道明证券戈德堡称债务上限僵局可能引发美国评级下调
item.description: 道明证券公司（TD Securities）美国利率策略主管根纳迪-戈德堡（Gennadiy Goldberg）表示，美国明年可能出现的债务上限僵局可能是自2011年危机以来最严重的一次，这可能引发主权信用评级再次下调。【原文：A potential debt ceiling standoff in the United States next year could be one of the worst since the 2011 crisis, which may trigger another sovereign credit rating downgrade, said Gennadiy Goldberg, the head of U.S. rates strategy at TD Securities.】

item.title: 解说员：欧盟对中国电动汽车的调查接下来会发生什么？
item.description: 欧盟委员会计划对中国生产的电动汽车（EV）征收 17.4%至 38.1%的临时关税，这是对汽车进口征收 10%标准关税的基础。【原文：The European Commission is planning to impose provisional duties on electric vehicles (EVs) produced in China ranging from 17.4% to 38.1%, on top of its standard 10% tariff for car imports.】

item.title: 二手车零售商 CarMax 第一季度利润下降
item.description: 周五，CarMax 公布第一季度利润下降约 33%，原因是销售车辆的利润率下降继续影响二手车行业。【原文：CarMax reported an about 33% dip in its first-quarter profit on Friday, as lower margins from vehicles sold continued to impact the used-vehicle industry.】

item.title: 德国最高工业工会要求大众加薪 7
item.description: 德国最高工业工会 IG Metall 周五发表声明称，该工会将在 10 月份的工资谈判中要求大众汽车在 12 个月内加薪 7%。【原文：German top industrial union IG Metall will demand a 7% pay rise over a 12-month period from Volkswagen at wage negotiations in October, the union said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街期货在商业调查数据公布前走低
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货走低，超级大盘科技股和芯片股失守，投资者等待制造业和服务业调查提供更多有关全球最大经济体健康状况的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Friday as megacap tech and chip stocks lost ground, with investors awaiting manufacturing and services sectors surveys for more clues on the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 中国就台湾军售问题制裁洛克希德-马丁公司
item.description: 中国外交部在一份声明中说，中国已就美国向台湾出售武器一事对洛克希德-马丁公司的一些子公司和高级管理人员实施制裁。【原文：China has imposed sanctions against some Lockheed Martin Corp subsidiaries and senior executives over U.S. arms sales to Taiwan, China's foreign ministry said in a statement.】

item.title: 中国困境持续，日产常州工厂停产
item.description: 日本汽车制造商日产汽车周五表示，为优化运营，该公司已停止在中国常州工厂的生产。【原文：Nissan Motor has halted production at its Changzhou plant in China as it seeks to optimise its operations, the Japanese automaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：英伟达眩晕，美元走强
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 独家报道亚马逊考虑为无利可图的 Alexa 服务每月标价 5 至 10 美元，并对人工智能进行改造
item.description: 据直接了解亚马逊公司计划的人士透露，亚马逊正计划对其亏损十年之久的 Alexa 服务进行重大改造，将对话式人工智能（AI）纳入其中，并提供两级服务。【原文：Amazon is planning a major revamp of its decade-old money-losing Alexa service to include a conversational generative AI with two tiers of service and has considered a monthly fee of around $5 to access the superior version, according to people with direct knowledge of the company's plans.】

item.title: 美国 英伟达眩晕，美元走强
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国提供 8.5 亿美元赠款清理石油行业甲烷排放
item.description: 美国政府于周五开始竞标，将于 8 月 26 日结束 8.5 亿美元的拨款，以帮助小型石油和天然气生产商监控和减少运营过程中产生的甲烷，这是拜登政府打击强效温室气体泄漏计划的重要组成部分。【原文：The U.S. government opened up on Friday competitive bidding that will close on Aug. 26 for $850 million in grants to help small oil and gas producers monitor and reduce methane from their operations, a major part of the Biden administration's plan to crack down on leaks of the potent greenhouse gas.】

item.title: 荷兰银行接近达成收购汇丰银行德国私人银行的交易，Boersenzeitung 称
item.description: 据《Boersenzeitung》周五报道，荷兰银行正在寻求进一步扩大在德国的业务，收购汇丰银行在德国的财富管理部门的交易已接近尾声，但未说明具体消息来源。【原文：Dutch bank ABN Amro is seeking to further expand in Germany as it is nearing a deal to acquire HSBC's wealth management unit in the country, newspaper Boersenzeitung reported on Friday, without specifying its sources.】

item.title: 消息人士称，竞购汇丰银行德国基金管理和托管部门的投标者络绎不绝
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，国泰君安、法国巴黎银行和 Caceis 正在排队成为出售汇丰德国基金管理部门 INKA 和托管业务的潜在竞标者。【原文：State Street , BNP Paribas and Caceis are lining up as potential bidders for the sale of HSBC Germany's fund administration unit INKA and custody business, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商继续掌控东南亚蓬勃发展的电动汽车市场
item.description: Counterpoint Research 公司周五表示，在中国比亚迪和越南 VinFast 的带动下，东南亚电动汽车销量激增，正在蚕食由日本和韩国公司主导的内燃机汽车市场。【原文：Electric vehicle sales are surging in Southeast Asia, led by China's BYD and Vietnam's VinFast , eating into the internal combustion engine car market dominated by Japanese and Korean firms, Counterpoint Research said on Friday.】

item.title: 华为称已取得巨大进步，从操作系统到人工智能
item.description: 中国华为技术公司（HWT.UL）周五表示，该公司在从操作系统到人工智能等领域取得了突破性进展，该公司用 10 年时间实现了美国和欧洲用 30 年时间才能实现的目标。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) said on Friday it had made breakthroughs in fields from operating systems to artificial intelligence, and that it had taken the company 10 years to do what the United States and Europe took 30 years to achieve.】

item.title: 飞机租赁商 DAE 认为中国商飞打破了空客和波音的双头垄断局面
item.description: 迪拜航空航天企业（DAE）飞机租赁公司负责人告诉路透社，中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞有机会在未来十年打破空客和波音对客机市场的双头垄断。【原文：Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC has the opportunity to break Airbus and Boeing's duopoly of the passenger jet market over the next decade, the chief of aircraft leasing company Dubai Aerospace Enterprise (DAE) told Reuters.】

item.title: 现金再次流出中国，对人民币构成压力
item.description: 人民币汇率下滑，大量现金从内地流向香港，这表明中国国内投资者正在放弃对国内市场立即复苏的预期，转而投向最接近的高收益资产。【原文：A sliding yuan and extensive outflows of cash from the mainland into Hong Kong show China's domestic investors are shelving expectations for any immediate recovery in their home markets and fleeing to the closest better-yielding assets.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长内田表示准备进一步提高利率
item.description: 日本央行副行长内田伸一周五表示，如果经济和物价走势符合其预测，央行将 "调整货币支持程度"，这表明央行已做好进一步加息的准备。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Shinichi Uchida said on Friday the central bank will "adjust the degree of monetary support" if the economy and prices move in line with its forecasts, signalling readiness to raise interest rates further.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：中国要求维萨卡和万事达卡削减交易费
item.description: 彭博新闻社援引一位熟知内情的人士的话报道称，中国正在推动威士卡和万事达卡降低在中国的银行卡交易费，作为方便外国游客支付的努力的一部分。【原文：China is pushing for Visa and Mastercard to lower their bank card transaction fees in the country, as part of an effort to facilitate payments for foreign visitors, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德不会参与马来西亚机场私有化，GIP 表示
item.description: 全球基础设施伙伴公司（GIP）表示，在穆斯林占多数的马来西亚，美国贝莱德（BlackRock）公司因被指与以色列有联系而受到批评，因此该公司的买家贝莱德将不会参与马来西亚机场的私有化。【原文：Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) said its buyer BlackRock will not be involved in privatising Malaysia Airports after criticism in Muslim-majority Malaysia over the U.S. firm's alleged ties to Israel.】

item.title: 欧洲太阳能发电激增冲击价格，暴露储能需求
item.description: 由于太阳能发电量激增导致供需不匹配，欧洲今年出现负电价的小时数达到创纪录水平，这可能有助于将投资转向急需的储能解决方案。【原文：Europe has clocked a record number of hours of negative power prices this year due to a mismatch between demand and supply as solar power generation soars, potentially helping to shift investment to much needed storage solutions.】

item.title: 英伟达的惊人涨幅让投资者纠结是套现还是买进更多
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）股价的大幅上涨让投资者开始权衡是要套现、继续持有以获取更多收益，还是追逐这只在过去一年里涨了三倍的股票。【原文：The huge rally in Nvidia Corp's shares has investors weighing whether to cash in, hold on for more gains or chase a stock that has tripled during the past year.】
